text: The Today Show is a morning talk/news show. It airs on National Broadcasting Company (NBC). As of 2018, the anchors are Savannah Guthrie and Craig Melvin. and Al Roker forecasts the weather. Carson Daly contributes to the program on a regular basis as well. During the week, the hours of Today (7:00 a.m. – 9:00 a.m.) are co-anchored by Savannah Guthrie (2012–present) and Craig Melvin (2025–present) alongside co-hosts Al Roker (weather anchor, 1996–present), and Carson Daly (features anchor, 2013–present). The show also has a third and fourth hour, but they are treated like separate shows. The third hour, called 3rd Hour Today, is hosted by Roker, Melvin, Sheinelle Jones and Dylan Dreyer. The fourth hour, called Jenna'and Friends', is hosted by Jenna Bush Hager. Former anchors include Bryant Gumbel, Katie Couric, Meredith Vieira, Ann Curry and Matt Lauer. ==References== Category:American television series Category:NBC network series Category:English-language television programs
